lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Earlier today a Morgan Guaranty official, while declining to reveal the pricing on the facility said that banks would be "compensated fairly" since this is a special purpose facility which must be completed quickly, with the signing expected in about 10 days.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers noted that the terms on the new facility compare extremely favourably to those on other short-term facilities for which pricing has turned extremely fine due to competition for the mandates.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Lead managers are being recruited at the 200 mln dlr level, co-lead managers at 125 mln and managers at 75 mln.
